page.title: 16The Law and Laggan
page.content: Laggan has had no resident policeman since 1955.The nearest policeman lives in Newtonmore 8 miles away and the nearest police station is in Kingussie 12 miles away.Aviemore-25 miles away is the closest fully manned station.Most policing is done by car,van,motor-cycle and in bad weather by Range Rover.There is a small court which sits in Kingussie.The nearest prison is Porterfield at Inverness.Since we have excellent liason between police and school,the children still grow up knowing who their local "Bobby" is.
